colors module¶

This module contains colors difinitions.

platform

Linux

author

Ovod18

CONSTANTS

WHITE

BLACK

RED

GREEN

BLUE

YELLOW


colors.BLACK = (0, 0, 0)¶

The RGB value of black color.

colors.BLUE = (0, 0, 255)¶

The RGB value of blue color.

colors.GREEN = (0, 255, 0)¶

The RGB value of green color.

colors.RED = (255, 0, 0)¶

The RGB value of red color.

colors.WHITE = (255, 255, 255)¶

The RGB value of white color.

colors.YELLOW = (255, 255, 0)¶

The RGB value of yellow color.
